titles.title: ADVANCE Act

A bill to require that certain standards for commercial driver's licenses applicable to former members of the armed services or reserves also apply to current members of the armed services or reserves.
Active Duty Voluntary Acquisition of Necessary Credentials for Employment Act
ADVANCE Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

bill.summary:
Active Duty Voluntary Acquisition of Necessary Credentials for Employment Act or the ADVANCE Act
This bill applies commercial driver's license standards for former members of the Armed Forces or reserves to current members of the Armed Forces or reserves.
The bill allows such covered individuals who have experience in driving vehicles similar to a commercial motor vehicle while serving in the Armed Forces or reserves to apply for an exemption from all or a portion of federal commercial motor vehicle driving test requirements.
